title: The Haunting of Helena (2012)
overview: After a divorce, Sophia moves to the south of Italy with her daughter, Helena. Their new home, an apartment within an austere building of the fascist age, is a chance for them to start a new life. But inside an old storage room hides a mysterious closet and a buried secret. After the loss of Helena’s first baby tooth, a chilling obsession begins and an apparition haunts her sleep...
storyline: A single mother moves into a new house with her daughter. Soon after the young girl has her first baby tooth fall off, she begins to recount that she is having nocturnal visits by a tooth fairy. It seems the house has a sinister history.
synopsis: Shortly after a broken marriage ends mother, a history lecturer and her daughter move to a new abode. Part of what moves in with them in an art deco period wardrobe. The ex-husband / father is introduced via a Skype like conversation and this serves as an tool of exposition telling us the circumstances, if not the reason for the breakup. The ex comes off as being something of a selfish schmuck who also cares about his daughter.The girl's tooth comes out and the out of the ordinary happenings begin. The tooth vsnishes from under the pillow. The next day the girl is buying teeth from kids at school with obsolete coinage. The girl says that all this is at the behest of the tooth fairy.A lot more happens but I am out of time. Will finish later or someone may pick up from here.
